p: On the other hand, the Hastings Center ( 2020) conducted a study to develop a framework for ethically sound work to achieve health education during the crisis, to achieve a balance between the duty of customer‐centered care, and focus on ethics for ethical practice under normal circumstances. With audience‐centered duties to support equal distribution of risks and social benefits, this study is designed to work on general health practice and guidance about COVID‐19. It aimed to help build ongoing discussions of predictable ethical issues arising from emergency care conditions by asking practical questions in public health emergencies, in situations of planning, protection, and guidance.
